get.summary: Gets a list of changemaker field value batches.
get.description: Returns a paginated list of all changemaker field value batches.

200.description: All changemaker field value batches currently registered in the PDC.

401.description: Authentication was not provided or was invalid.

post.summary: Creates a new changemaker field value batch.
post.description: Creates a new batch record to group changemaker field values that were imported together from an external source.

201.description: The new changemaker field value batch that was created.

401.description: Authentication was not provided or was invalid.
